summary: Add proper rounded corners to lobby thumbnails by wrapping images in a clipping container.
architectural_notes: For thumbnail corner rounding with object-fit: contain, apply border-radius and overflow: hidden to a wrapper container that clips the image.
known_issues: Lobby thumbnails do not visually show rounded corners due to object-fit: contain leaving unrounded empty space; needs wrapper clipping.

existing_features.title: Update lobby chatroom card thumbnails so the visible media (including when using `object-fit: contain`) is clipped to rounded corners by wrapping the `` (and any overlay layers) in a rounded container with `overflow-hidden`, across all thumbnail types (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter/X, and generic media).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update lobby thumbnails to display border radius correctly by wrapping the image in a rounded container with overflow hidden (works with object-fit: contain).

projectName: Fix lobby thumbnail border radius by clipping media inside a rounded wrapper
